wikipedia_page.main: Frederick White (5 December 1916 – January 2007) was an English footballer who played as a goalkeeper. Born in Wolverhampton he made 86 appearances in the Football League for Sheffield United and Lincoln City, as well as having spells with Wolverhampton Wanderers, Everton and Gainsborough Trinity.
